name: Recent Local News
shortDescription: Updates and happenings around the area
longDescription: Short narrated updates on recent local news and community happenings — great for staying informed while walking or driving through neighborhoods.

name: Local History
shortDescription: Stories from the past in this place
longDescription: Narrated accounts of the area's history — landmarks, key events, and how the place evolved over time, told to add context to the locations you pass.

name: Stories That Shaped the Place
longDescription: Narrated episodes about significant events and personal stories that shaped the character and development of this location.

name: Food & Cuisine
longDescription: Audio guides to the local food scene: signature dishes, historic eateries, street-food spots and culinary traditions worth tasting or visiting.

name: Wildlife & Nature
shortDescription: Animals and plants unique to the area
longDescription: Narrated highlights of local wildlife and notable plants you might encounter nearby, including seasonal behaviors and where to look for them safely.

name: Crime & Notorious Events
longDescription: Crisp, responsibly narrated episodes about notable crimes, investigations, or infamous local events — contextualized and respectful for listeners.

name: Famous For & Landmarks
shortDescription: What the place is known for
longDescription: Narrations that explain why a location is famous — iconic landmarks, monuments, viewpoints, and the stories behind them.

name: Culture & Traditions
longDescription: Audio explanations of cultural practices, traditional celebrations, and community rituals to help listeners appreciate local life and customs.

name: Architecture & Buildings
longDescription: Narrated descriptions of notable buildings, architectural styles, and design elements that define the area's built environment.

name: Music & Performance
longDescription: Short stories about the local music scene, performance venues, and influential artists who performed or emerged from this place.

name: Nature & Geography
longDescription: Narrated introductions to local natural features — parks, rivers, hills, geological formations and scenic viewpoints you might encounter on your route.

name: Routes & Transport
longDescription: Audio context on important transport routes, historic roads, and how people moved through the area — useful when walking or driving along old paths and thoroughfares.

name: Industry & Economy
longDescription: Narrated background on local industries, historic trades, and economic drivers that shaped neighborhoods and livelihoods here.

name: People & Biographies
longDescription: Short biographical sketches of notable residents, founders, artists or unsung local heroes whose lives intersect with places you'll pass.

name: Religion & Spiritual Sites
shortDescription: Places of worship and faith traditions
longDescription: Narrated histories of religious sites, spiritual practices, and faith communities that have been part of the area's cultural fabric.

name: Art & Museums
longDescription: Narrated notes on local art, museums, public installations and the stories behind notable works of art you may pass by or visit.

name: Sports & Recreation
shortDescription: Local teams, parks and leisure spots
longDescription: Short histories and fun facts about local sports teams, venues and recreational traditions where residents gather and play.

name: Folklore & Legends
longDescription: Entertaining narrated folklore, myths and local legends tied to places, perfect for an engaging audio experience while exploring.

name: Local Events & Festivals
longDescription: Audio guides to recurring events, festivals and seasonal activities — when they happen, what to expect, and the traditions behind them.
